title: ISketchRelation.IGetEntitiesType
description: Gets the types of entities in this sketch relation.
returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of types of entities in this sketch relation as defined by swSketchRelationEntityTypes_e VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Before calling this method, call
ISketchRelation::GetEntitiesCount
to get the value for NumEntities.
